name: omni-post
description: OmniPost - Broadcast Everywhere, Manage Once. The Ultimate Multi-Platform Content Publishing Tool

scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: npm run create:venv -w apps/backend && npm run install:python -w apps/backend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.info: npm run info -w apps/frontend && npm run info -w apps/backend

author: rbbtsn0w <hamiltonsnow@gmail.com>
notes: This is a full-stack project with separate dependencies for frontend and backend.
Frontend dependencies are managed by npm in apps/frontend/package.json.
Backend dependencies are managed by pip in apps/backend/requirements.txt.
Python version must be 3.10.x (>=3.10.0 <3.11.0) as specified in README.md.
It is recommended to run Python in a virtual environment (venv) as specified in README.md.
Use the :venv suffix commands to run in a virtual environment.
For example: npm run install:all:venv, npm run dev:backend:venv.
Please follow the setup instructions in the README.md file.
